messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Re: New pics uploaded ^^
messages.msgSnippet: omg...u still have the wild haired saitoh XD XD that was probably my favourite pic of Saitoh... ROFL yes i was going to draw an awake Saitoh
messages.messageBody:
omg...u still have the wild haired saitoh XD XD that was probably my
favourite pic of Saitoh... ROFL yes i was going to draw an awake Saitoh
next...unfortunately he only appears like that ONCE in the entire PMK manga
>.< well, in all the chapters i have anyway...
maybe in burai the guys tie the hair into a bun when they go out to fight?
rofl Although i must say it's going to be hard fitting all that white hair
(who IS that guyanyway?) in a tiny bun...>.>
so, umm...a tiny request to everyone: if anybody has a pic of *awake* PMK
Saitoh, will you please email it to me? ^^;;; thanks a bunch!!!

--- secretary <secretarytocapt3@...> wrote:

>
> I *LOVE* PMK Saitoh his hair is perfect!!!....
> and if you check out this link you'll know that I greatly appreciate
> PMK Saitoh's hair http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/sig6.jpg
>
> His sleepy eyes are sooo cute...you want to try you hand and drawing
> PMK Saitoh when he is actually *awake*? (^_^) that is when he is
> fighting LOL!
>
> Burai Saitoh has nice hair too...but I think the hair is historically
> innaccurate...I mean can we all imagine these guys flicking their
> hair back all the time or brushing away their bangs? ::giggles::

messages.subject: Re: New pics uploaded ^^
messages.msgSnippet: I *LOVE* PMK Saitoh his hair is perfect!!!.... and if you check out this link you ll know that I greatly appreciate PMK Saitoh s hair
messages.messageBody:
I *LOVE* PMK Saitoh his hair is perfect!!!....
and if you check out this link you'll know that I greatly appreciate
PMK Saitoh's hair http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/sig6.jpg

His sleepy eyes are sooo cute...you want to try you hand and drawing
PMK Saitoh when he is actually *awake*? (^_^) that is when he is
fighting LOL!

Burai Saitoh has nice hair too...but I think the hair is historically
innaccurate...I mean can we all imagine these guys flicking their
hair back all the time or brushing away their bangs? ::giggles::

messages.messageBody:
Hi ppls! ^^ I just finished 2 pics yesterday, one is the PMK version of
Saitoh (since i already drew him as RK version) and other is Yamazaki Ayumu
(susumu's sis! XD)... i uploaded them under teh illustrations folder in
pictures section. Please take a look, any comments are appreciated! ^^ Thank you!!!
